about_the_game:
Play online with up to 10 players (5v5) as Bounty Hunters and Mimics will battle it out in hilariously sneaky and strategic first/third person gameplay.

Headphones are highly recommended, as sound is one of the most important ways to detect the dreaded Mimics!

The Hunters

A team of Bounty Hunters summoned from across the universe, they will stop at nothing to destroy the Mimic Man's essence once and for all.
  • Win by eliminating all enemy team Mimics before time runs out.
  • You will be injured when attacking objects that are not player Mimics - shoot wisely.
  • Listen closely - the taunting cry of a Mimic will reveal it's location.
  • Use various weapons with different advantages.

The Mimics

Created from the Mimic Man's essence, The Mimics will do anything they can to survive and continue to spread throughout the universe.
  • Win by having at least one player Mimic survive until time runs out.
  • Stay on the move to survive - Hunters will try to use process of elimination to find you!
  • Use special physics movement to blend in and deceive Hunters.
  • Mimicking objects to hide in plain sight and fool Hunters
  • Taunt and distract Hunters so that teammates in trouble can escape.

Features

  • Customization: Player models, hats, equipment, taunts, and more
  • Custom match settings to keep the gameplay dynamic and fun
    • Auto-Taunt: Mimics are forced to taunt every so often
    • Taunts Heal: Mimic taunts will heal, but at what cost?!
    • Taunt Or Die: Mimics must taunt to survive
  • Multiplayer physics replication.
  • Level up to unlock equipment

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700K CPU @ 4.00GHz 4.00 GHz

  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 10

  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Mimic Man is a team based 5v5 multi-player tactical hybrid first/third person shooter. Team up with friends to defeat the opposing team in an ultimate battle of action and wits. Hunters must eliminate mimics quickly, but beware, for mimics will disguise, sabotage and taunt you to stay alive.
